ch0247_40_dande/0101_0701_01_10:
All right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s get out
there and bring energy and passion to the world!
ch0247_40_dande/0101_0701_02_10:
Whether it’s an adventure or a Pokémon battle,
I’ll be right there by your side!
ch0247_40_dande/7101_0701_01_10:
Since I became Champion, I’ve really been quite
busy every day.
ch0247_40_dande/7101_0701_02_10:
But I’ve decided that no matter what, I’ve got to
make time to see everyone on special occasions.
ch0247_40_dande/7101_0701_03_10:
That’s because spending time with family and
friends is just as important as Pokémon battles!
ch0247_40_dande/7102_0701_01_10:
I wonder if someday Glastrier will let me ride it
like Calyrex does.
ch0247_40_dande/7102_0701_02_10:
If I could ride around on Glastrier while delivering
presents, people would definitely get a kick out
of that!
ch0247_40_dande/7103_0701_01_10:
My usual cap is pretty cool, but don’t you think this
hat looks great on me, too?
ch0247_40_dande/7103_0701_02_10:
Now I’m thinking I should start trying on even
more types of hats. Maybe I could get one of
those that you see on a Galarian Weezing!
ch0247_40_dande/7103_0701_03_10: Wait...that’s not actually a hat, is it?
ch0247_40_dande/7104_0701_01_10:
When I look out over the snow here on Pasio, it
reminds me of the Crown Tundra.
ch0247_40_dande/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s really easy to get lost out there, but now that
I’ve got Calyrex and the others with me, I have
nothing to worry about!
ch0247_40_dande/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Is there
anything you’ve been wanting to get as a present?
ch0247_40_dande/7105_0701_02_10:
If there is, you can count on me to deliver the
finest present to you in the most spectacular way!
ch0247_40_dande/1701_0701_01_10: To you from me! It’s present time!
ch0247_40_dande/1701_0702_01_10:
That feeling of excitement when you get the gift...
That’s part of the present, too!
ch0247_40_dande/2501_0701_01_10:
Even though Calyrex is a stern Pokémon, it also
has a merciful side. It heals its opponents’ wounds
after battle.
ch0247_40_dande/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve learned a lot from Calyrex, and it got
me thinking...
ch0247_40_dande/2501_0701_03_10:
Being a Champion isn’t just about being strong.
You’ve got to be tough on your challengers, but
you have to care about them as well.
ch0247_40_dande/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve got a heart that’s burning with passion, while
Calyrex is as cool as ice.
ch0247_40_dande/2501_0702_02_10:
Fire and ice makes us well-balanced as a sync
pair, don’t you think?
ch0247_40_dande/2511_0701_01_10:
My usual cape is pretty good, but I’ve got to
say...this coat I’ve got on now is nice and cozy.
ch0247_40_dande/2511_0701_02_10:
With this on, I feel like I could stay out exploring
the Crown Tundra for ages!
ch0247_40_dande/2511_0701_03_10:
There are a lot of places there I haven’t been to
yet, and I’ve been wanting to go on an adventure
with Calyrex!
ch0247_40_dande/2511_0702_01_10:
When we go to the Crown Tundra, you’re coming
with us, right?
ch0247_40_dande/2511_0702_02_10:
I’ll give you a warm coat just like mine as
a present!
ch0247_40_dande/3001_0701_01_10:
I’m feeling more excited than usual this morning.
I bet a battle is waiting for us just around
the corner!
ch0247_40_dande/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m off to deliver some presents! Don’t worry—
even if I get lost on the way, I’ll make sure they
get to the right person!
ch0247_40_dande/3005_0701_01_10:
Be sure to get home before nightfall!
You might get a present if you keep up
the good behavior!
